abstract: SUMMARY An enzyme system, found predominantly in adrenal glands, capable of cleaving cholesterol t.o pregnenolone and isocaproic acid is described. BIBLIOGRAPHY 1. Lynn, W. S., Jr., Staple, E., and Gurin, S., .I. Am. Chem. SOL, 76, 4048 (1954). 2. Stone, D., and Hechter, O., Arch. Biochem. and Biophys., 64, 121 (1955). 3. Hechter, O., Zaffaroni, A., Jacobsen, R.
